beats.visual: Duchess calibrates trampoline knobs labeled 'cartoon mode'.
Test jump launches Duchess into slow orbit around birdbath.
Duchess scribbles equations midair with floating chalk.
Trampoline morphs into wave sending Duchess surfing.
Gravity pauses; Duchess floats sipping juice box.
Duchess rebounds downward, trampoline becomes giant drum.
beats.gag_note: Drum beat syncs with heartbeat monitor.

beats.visual: Backflip chain reaction launches garden gnomes cheering.
Duchess lands hero pose as trampoline bows politely.
Clip ends with slow float high-five to camera.

tts_line: Duchess thinks gravity is just a polite suggestion.
style_prompt: cartoon elegant black cat, satin sheen, clean bold outlines, flat jewel-tone accents, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, backyard trampoline lab with floating chalk equations, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
